content:
## n8n@0.187.2 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.187.1...n8n@0.187.2) for this version.
**Release date:** 2022-07-21 This is a bug fix release. * Editor: fix for a console issue. * Editor: fix a login issue for non-admin users. * Editor: fix problems with the credentials modal that occured when no node is open. * NocoDB node: fix for an authentication issue.
